title: Coronation Street spoilers: Ruxandra Porojnicu confirmed to return as Alina Pop
text:
Coronation Street viewers will have to bid farewell to quite a few familiar faces in the coming months, but actress Ruxandra Porojnicu will be making a return to the soap, which means that her character Alina Pop — who featured heavily in the modern slavery and human trafficking storyline earlier this year — will be back on our screens real soon.

Alina worked at Nail Sparkle — the nail bar which was operated by the slavery ring of which she was a victim, and was made to work there against her will. During her time on the cobbles, she also built up quite the relationship with Seb (Harry Visinoni) — whom she met while he completed a building job at the nail bar.

Although he was first unaware of her circumstances, the truth eventually came to light, when Jan Losinski (Piotr Baumann) brought down the slavery ring. In spite of their burgeoning relationship, Alina and Seb were forced to go their separate ways when Alina left earlier this year.

However, it appears as if the young couple could have another shot at happiness, as The Daily Star reports that Coronation Street bosses are bringing back actress Ruxandra.

A source told The Daily Star: ‘Alina’s harrowing story was one of the biggest of the year and Ruxandra’s performance during some of the darker scenes was heartbreaking.

‘She proved very popular with the viewers and everyone was gutted that Alina and Seb didn’t get their happy ending. So with her returning later this year it looks like their love story is far from over.’

‘There’s so much scope for the writers given everything that she’s been through. Everyone is very excited about her return.’

Coronation Street returns on Wednesday 16th October at 7:30pm and 8:30pm on ITV.
